title: Mac client will not start after selecting "Play" on the launcher after the 3.12 patch
body: I know this has been a hot topic, but I have noticed everyone is having the same problem but in different ways. Whereas a few problems I've read on the subject has been mostly on the launcher, my problem is what happens after I press "play", or rather, what isn't happening. I have uninstalled LoL from my mac, twice. I have tried repairing it multiple times, switched regions, languages, all with no progress. I had just played last night before the patch update and now I cant even get to the login screen. Has anyone received any word from riot as of yet? And if not, anyone having better luck than I am? I have the day off, the girlfriend is away for the day, and the weather is as crappy as it gets. If there was ever a day where League was my plans, TODAY WAS THAT DAY! HELP RIOT, HEEELLLPPPPPP!!

replies.body: I have a laptop pc and it doesn't work for me either

Yeah I had a problem like that the first game I tried to play on both mac and pc. Good news was after the first time and restarting everything worked fine. I will always play at least 3 custom games after a patch just to make sure I test their release so I don't get banned in real games.
And still nothing from riot yet?
Wouldn't be so bad if they'd at least let us know they've acknowledged there's a problem and that a solution is underway

Hey SuperBearManBro!

Sorry for not responding to this thread sooner!  I recently posted an update about an issue facing Mac Users with the latest patch, which you can find here:

http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/c/support/eHL23EKr-crashes-on-opening-the-game?comment=000700000000000000000001

I'm sorry I am not able to provide more direct support at this time, however.  :(  Rest assured this is something we are actively investigating so that we can get it fixed asap!
